definitions: To come into the presence or company of (someone) by chance or arrangement.
To come together with (something) from an opposite direction.
To fulfill or satisfy (a need, requirement, or condition).
To experience or encounter (a particular fate, situation, or person).
To come into contact with (a surface or object).
examples: He meets his friends every Friday.
The two roads meets at the intersection.
The company meets all safety standards.
The ball meets the wall with a thud.
